name: Legion of Super Heroes: Colossal Boy Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Colossal Boy's real name?
questions.explanation:
Gim Allon.

	Adam Wylie is an actor who voiced the character of Colossal Boy on the WB cartoon series 'Legion of Super Heroes'.

questions.text: In original continuity, what is Colossal Boy's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Earth.

	Gim and his family resided on Earth.  It was during time on a visit to Mars that he encountered the radiated meteor that mutated him with the ability to grow in size and mass.

questions.text: Colossal Boy shares something in his pre-Legion career with fellow LSH member Saturn Girl.  What is it?
questions.correct: They both were accepted as Science Police Training Cadets.
options: They both participated in professional sports
They both had overcome addictions to kono-ale.
They both had been super heroes prior to joining.
questions.explanation:
They both were accepted as Science Police Training Cadets.

	As a cadet he worked with fellow Science Police cadet Gigi Cusimano, who would later be assigned as official liaison between the Legion and the Science Police.

questions.text: What religion are the members of Colossal Boy's family?
questions.explanation:
Jewish.

	Gim and his parents Wynn and Marte Allon were often shown practicing their faith through Jewish rituals and holidays.

questions.text: Colossal Boy's mother, Martw, was a history professor at Metropolis University when first introduced.  Later she would take on a more high profile job.  What was it?
options: Actress on a highly rated inter-planet soap opera.
Host of the Intergalactic News Network
questions.explanation:
President of the United Planets.

	In the future era of the Legion, political leaders are chosen through a sort of lottery type vetting system.  Marte was selected for Earth and eventually becomes the President of the United Planets.

questions.text: For many years Colossal Boy had an unrequited crush on which fellow Legion member?
questions.explanation:
Shrinking Violet.

	This crush was portrayed for many years, but Shrinking Violet was dating Duplicate Boy, a member of the Heroes of Lallor.

questions.text: Colossal Boy would eventually marry Yera.  Yera was a citizen of the same home planet of one of Colossal Boy's fellow Legion members.  Which member?
questions.explanation:
Chameleon Boy.

	Yera was a Durlan like Chameleon Boy.  She will be covered in a future quiz since she eventually ends up as a fellow Legion member named Chameleon Girl!

questions.text: In the "Five Year Later" continuity, Colossal Boy had retired from the Legion when it disbanded.   When the team was being reformed, he chose not to rejoin.  What career had he undertaken and chosen to stay with?
options: Writer of a series of books on the Legion's previous adventures
questions.explanation:
Working with the Science Police.

	Gim rejoined the Science Police after the Legion disbanded, and eventually was promoted to the position of Chief.

questions.text: Following the 'Zero Hour' initial reboot, Colossal Boy would become a Legion member under a different code name.  What was it?
questions.explanation:
Leviathan.

	In this continuity, Gim was originally from Mars, not Earth, and he was a full member of the Science Police before gaining his powers.  Because of his SP experience, he was elected as the first Leader of the Legion, but he stepped down after realizing Cosmic Boy was better suited for the role.  In this continuity, Gim dies in battle rather early in the run.

questions.text: In the continuity referred to as threeboot (2004-2009), our hero yet again had a different code name.  What was it?
questions.explanation:
Micro Lad.

	In this continuity, Gim was from a planet filled with giant sized people, and he had a genetic mutation that allowed him to SHRINK to just 6 feet tall.  He considered all his fellow Legion members as being tiny people.
